lead_paragraph: The New England Patriots finished the regular season with a perfect road record, and are hoping their next trip is to the Super Bowl.
snippet: The New England Patriots finished the regular season with a perfect road record, and are hoping their next trip is to the Super Bowl....

headline.main: Brady Throws for 3 Scores to Help Pats Beat Miami 35-14
